verses.plain: The earth is the LORD’s, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

tokens.t: The earth
the
, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

verses.plain: For he hath founded it upon the seas, and established it upon the floods.

tokens.t: For he hath founded it upon the seas, and established it upon the floods.

verses.plain: Who shall ascend into the hill of the LORD? or who shall stand in his holy place?

tokens.t: Who shall ascend into the hill of the
? or who shall stand in his holy place?

verses.plain: He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; who hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity, nor sworn deceitfully.

tokens.t: He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; who hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity, nor sworn deceitfully.

verses.plain: He shall receive the blessing from the LORD, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.

tokens.t: He shall receive the blessing from the
, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.

verses.plain: This is the generation of them that seek him, that seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.

tokens.t: This
the generation of them that seek him, that seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.

verses.plain: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.

tokens.t: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.

verses.plain: Who is this King of glory? The LORD strong and mighty, the LORD mighty in battle.

tokens.t: Who
this King of glory? The
strong and mighty, the
mighty in battle.

verses.plain: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift them up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.

tokens.t: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift
up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.

verses.plain: Who is this King of glory? The LORD of hosts, he is the King of glory. Selah.

tokens.t: Who is this King of glory? The
of hosts, he
the King of glory. Selah.

footnotes.text: He…: Heb. The clean of hands
O Jacob: or, O God of Jacob
